alert.note: Alert for Muskegon; Newaygo; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:23AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Newaygo, Muskegon and southern Oceana Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 1223 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Hesperia to 6 miles southwest of Whitehall to 31 miles west of Montague. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Muskegon... Newaygo... White Cloud... Muskegon Heights... Fremont... Roosevelt Park... North Muskegon... Whitehall... Montague... Lakewood Club... Ravenna... Fruitport... Hesperia... Grant... Norton Shores... Dalton... Croton... Holton... Sullivan... Bridgeton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
